summary: Makes the Skyrim Shrouded Armor slightly darker with no orange
descriptionHtml:
Makes the Shouded Armor in Skyrim Darker more like Oblivions textures. It only adds a Male Texture so far however if people want it I could make a different looking female DB armor aswell perhaps Purple instead of Orange like in Oblivion I don\'t know but let me Know what you think would be the best.

For Installation just put all files into:

C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\armor\\dbarmor
author: Kingqueenjack
